course_title: Advanced Studies in Music Theory - CONTEMP MUS THRY

sections.comments: In this survey of the contemporary practices of music theory, participants will study, critique, and apply some recent and topical theoretical writings about a wide range of music, focusing not only on the content of the theories but also on how they are presented and contextualized.2020W Format: Students attend an online seminar every Friday from 1-3:30 pm.

description: Research seminar on a core or emerging topic in music theory. May be repeated to a maximum of 12 credits if different topics are covered.
